channel.title: Please take some time to give me the answers to these questions
channel.description:
ok, i'm a brand new newb. That's one thing straight.
Another, i don't have any experience of java, but have off javascript C++ Vb.net and C#.
I download the new Java DK, but i'm still not sure on a few things....
[b]These are the questions:[/b]
1.) how do you open and modify .cfg and .class files? and other unknow file types (not .bat)
2.) Simple quick tutorial on how to add an item?
3.) I don't understand where the graphics and animations etc. are stored and how i can make my own.... help?
Ok thanks for your time please resolve this for me so i can get a basic understanding asap.
